name: places/ChIJIxztKdZZwokRT7lfcU5IhHc
formattedAddress: 83 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 83 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012-4437, USA

originalText.text: I made an order with them over a month and a half ago I was told that it would take three weeks and the product never came on time. It still is not here and it was a gift for someone and now they will be receiving the gift late, because I was given wrong information about when the product would be ready by be careful with this company. If you want something done with them, I would try and Order two months out in advance just to be safe if you need your order for a special occasion or date

originalText.text: Very good customer service support. I’m very excited about getting my personal statue. I think the wait time 4 to 6 weeks is worth it..

text.text: Very good customer service support. I’m very excited about getting my personal statue. I think the wait time 4 to 6 weeks is worth it..

originalText.text:
I work an LIVE in the area. An the unique pieces in the STORES front drew me in for a deeper look. I am absolutely amazed at the work they do. A VERY unique one of one experience. Makes an everlasting addition to an already memorable moment. These are items you WILL cherish forever. The staff are very passionate at what they do. Ensuring you LOOK and FEEL your best to capture the OVERALL best SIDE of you. I am definitely recommending all to go in and enjoy the EXPERIENCE. It is unmatched.

"When you arrive at a Dopl location, our experts will help you look your best, prepare for your 360° image capture, and answer any questions you might have about the process"

*Tyler (YouTube NAKDtv)

originalText.text: I only gave them 3 stars because the lack of communication is horrible. We visited the New York location and was told we should receive our Dopl in 4 weeks even though the website said 2-3 weeks. We originally wanted to use our Dopl as a topper for our cake at our anniversary party so 4 weeks wasn’t bad because we still would have received it in time. Unfortunately it took 7 weeks for us to receive our Dopl. I called the New York location multiple times and even though they were nice they were no help. I didn’t even get a tracking number until week 6. If I didn’t go to the location myself I would have thought it was a scam. After multiple unpleasant emails from me “that I had to go to their website myself to find” I finally got a tracking number and received my Dopl. We were not able to use our Dopl at our anniversary party due to it not arriving in time and I was super disappointed about that. The Dopl itself is beautiful and they did an amazing job on the details but the communication is horrible.

originalText.text:
Whew. Terrible experience across the board.  I purchased a Dopl as a Christmas present for my partner seven weeks ago and I still have not received the Dopl nor any indication that it's even remotely close to shipping.

You read that correctly. It's now 01/24 and I'm still waiting on a CHRISTMAS PRESENT to be delivered from this company although they said the gift would most certainly arrive before Christmas.

This isn't even considering the astronomical price for the figurines -- which of course I was aware of when I purchased -- but I assumed the price tag would be justified through quality or customer service? Wrong. Oh so, so wrong.

Interacting with customer service, they respond every few days when they get around to it, with vague replies, unhelpful information, and absolutely zero commitment to helping with the process or making the situation right.

I can't imagine running my business like this and staying afloat. Honestly, it's coming across as more of a scam than anything else. Beware!
